name: GemWars
blurb: A unique mix of city management, word exploration and realtime strategic battles in a time when Gods and mythical creatures ruled earth

rewards.reward: You will get a very funny "Thank you" email from us. Not to be missed!
Our artists have created a very special, one of a kind piece of art work for our backers to use as they see fit, it would look really good on your Facebook or Twitter page for example.

For a mere $5 we will send you a few GemWars wallpapers and screen-savers via email. \r\n\r\nOur artists have spent hours on these beautiful images and we know you will love them! We will also send out a thank you tweet with your name in the subject on our Twitter page.

Want to be part of the exclusive GemWars community? We are looking for awesome people like you to help us make decision on certain aspects of the game development. \r\n\r\nFor $8 we will add you to an exclusive mailing list and ask you for your feedback and opinions. This means you will have a direct impact on helping to create GemWars

Want a really cool certificate proving that you helped make GemWars a reality? \r\n\r\nOrder this perk and we will send you (via email) a beautiful GemWars certificate (with your name on it) for you to frame and hang on your wall. Doesn't get better than that!

Your name on our website. We already get quite a bit of traffic on our website, and as soon as GemWars becomes a hit we are sure to see that traffic increase!\r\n\r\nPledge $15 and we will add your name to the "Thank you wall" for the world to see how awesome you are - we can even link your page to the wall.

Exclusive invite to Beta test GemWars and offer your ideas on how to improve the game (if need be). \r\n\r\nYour name on our website\u00b4s "Thank you wall" You will get a very funny "Thank you" email from us. Not to be missed!
All of the perks mentioned before (below $30)
All of the perks mentioned before + YOUR NAME in the end credits of the game.
One of a kind GemWars T-shirt plus all previously mentioned perks - check out the shirts in the campaign brief.
All of the perks mentioned before + FREE access to all of Bravo\u00b4s previous full game versions. Check out our website for more info;\r\n\r\nhttp://bravogamestudios.com/blog/games/
All of the perks mentioned before + A handwritten letter of thanks from the CEO of Bravo Game Studios.

All of the perks mentioned before (excluding limited rewards) + A special invitation to Alpha test the game and request changes/improvements. You will work directly with our developers (over email and google hangouts) to help make GemWars awesome.
All of the perks mentioned before (excluding limited rewards) + The ability to name a character of your choice. Note: Names need to be approved by our team and must fit with the feel of the game.

Kate\u00b4s shoes! This is a VERY special perk, a one of a kind! Along with all the perks mentioned previously (up to the value of $150) we will also be giving away Kate\u00b4s very funky red shoes, as seen in the video under our perks. Only one lucky person will get to take ownership of these puppies so we suggest you move quick!

All of the perks mentioned before (excluding limited rewards) + A four night stay in a luxury hotel in Seville-Spain (the home of BGS). During your stay you will visit our studios and meet everyone here to provide ideas for GemWars and see how the magic is made. We will also show you around the most beautiful city in the world and do lots of touristy things while treating you like the VIP that you are. 




Note: flights and travel not included.
